blocks.title: Payment Quantities are Here
blocks.content: Boost your income with improved payment fields. Just turn on quantities for any order form field and allow customers to buy multiples of the same item with ease.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/docs/enabling-quantity-selection-in-your-payment-forms/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Payment Quantities Get Started Lite

blocks.title: Pre-Made Email Templates
blocks.content: Give a great first impression with professionally designed form notifications. Choose from different email template designs and customize your notifications to match your website theme and branding.

blocks.content: Create unique, realtime calculator forms in WordPress, with endless possibilities for customization. Get more sales inquiries with dynamic lead magnets, automated discounts, and instant quotes.
